Misconfigurations.Title: Runs with a root primary or supplementary GID
Misconfigurations.Description: According to pod security standard 'Non-root groups', containers should be forbidden from running with a root primary or supplementary GID.
Misconfigurations.Message: secret rasa-x-postgresql in null namespace should set spec.securityContext.runAsGroup, spec.securityContext.supplementalGroups[*] and spec.securityContext.fsGroup to integer greater than 0
Misconfigurations.Resolution: Set 'containers[].securityContext.runAsGroup' to a non-zero integer or leave undefined.

Misconfigurations.Title: Can elevate its own privileges
Misconfigurations.Description: A program inside the container can elevate its own privileges and run as root, which might give the program control over the container and node.
Misconfigurations.Message: Container 'rasa-x-postgresql' of StatefulSet 'rasa-x-postgresql' should set 'securityContext.allowPrivilegeEscalation' to false

Misconfigurations.Title: Default capabilities: some containers do not drop all
Misconfigurations.Description: The container should drop all default capabilities and add only those that are needed for its execution.
Misconfigurations.Message: Container 'rasa-x-postgresql' of StatefulSet 'rasa-x-postgresql' should add 'ALL' to 'securityContext.capabilities.drop'

Misconfigurations.Title: CPU not limited
Misconfigurations.Description: Enforcing CPU limits prevents DoS via resource exhaustion.
Misconfigurations.Message: Container 'rasa-x-postgresql' of StatefulSet 'rasa-x-postgresql' should set 'resources.limits.cpu'

Misconfigurations.Title: Runs as root user
Misconfigurations.Description: Force the running image to run as a non-root user to ensure least privileges.
Misconfigurations.Message: Container 'rasa-x-postgresql' of StatefulSet 'rasa-x-postgresql' should set 'securityContext.runAsNonRoot' to true

Misconfigurations.Title: Root file system is not read-only
Misconfigurations.Description: An immutable root file system prevents applications from writing to their local disk. This can limit intrusions, as attackers will not be able to tamper with the file system or write foreign executables to disk.
Misconfigurations.Message: Container 'rasa-x-postgresql' of StatefulSet 'rasa-x-postgresql' should set 'securityContext.readOnlyRootFilesystem' to true

Misconfigurations.Title: Memory not limited
Misconfigurations.Description: Enforcing memory limits prevents DoS via resource exhaustion.
Misconfigurations.Message: Container 'rasa-x-postgresql' of StatefulSet 'rasa-x-postgresql' should set 'resources.limits.memory'

Misconfigurations.Title: Runs with UID <= 10000
Misconfigurations.Description: Force the container to run with user ID > 10000 to avoid conflicts with the hostâ€™s user table.
Misconfigurations.Message: Container 'rasa-x-postgresql' of StatefulSet 'rasa-x-postgresql' should set 'securityContext.runAsUser' > 10000

Misconfigurations.Title: Runs with GID <= 10000
Misconfigurations.Description: Force the container to run with group ID > 10000 to avoid conflicts with the hostâ€™s user table.
Misconfigurations.Message: Container 'rasa-x-postgresql' of StatefulSet 'rasa-x-postgresql' should set 'securityContext.runAsGroup' > 10000

Misconfigurations.Title: Runtime/Default Seccomp profile not set
Misconfigurations.Description: According to pod security standard 'Seccomp', the RuntimeDefault seccomp profile must be required, or allow specific additional profiles.
Misconfigurations.Message: Either Pod or Container should set 'securityContext.seccompProfile.type' to 'RuntimeDefault'

Misconfigurations.Title: Seccomp policies disabled
Misconfigurations.Description: A program inside the container can bypass Seccomp protection policies.
Misconfigurations.Message: container rasa-x-postgresql of statefulset rasa-x-postgresql in null namespace should specify a seccomp profile
Misconfigurations.Resolution: Specify seccomp either by annotation or by seccomp profile type having allowed values as per pod security standards

Misconfigurations.Title: Container capabilities must only include NET_BIND_SERVICE
Misconfigurations.Description: Containers must drop ALL capabilities, and are only permitted to add back the NET_BIND_SERVICE capability.
Misconfigurations.Message: container should drop all
Misconfigurations.Resolution: Set 'spec.containers[*].securityContext.capabilities.drop' to 'ALL' and only add 'NET_BIND_SERVICE' to 'spec.containers[*].securityContext.capabilities.add'.

Misconfigurations.Title: Runs with a root primary or supplementary GID
Misconfigurations.Description: According to pod security standard 'Non-root groups', containers should be forbidden from running with a root primary or supplementary GID.
Misconfigurations.Message: statefulset rasa-x-postgresql in null namespace should set spec.securityContext.runAsGroup, spec.securityContext.supplementalGroups[*] and spec.securityContext.fsGroup to integer greater than 0
Misconfigurations.Resolution: Set 'containers[].securityContext.runAsGroup' to a non-zero integer or leave undefined.

Misconfigurations.Title: Runs with a root primary or supplementary GID
Misconfigurations.Description: According to pod security standard 'Non-root groups', containers should be forbidden from running with a root primary or supplementary GID.
Misconfigurations.Message: service rasa-x-postgresql-headless in null namespace should set spec.securityContext.runAsGroup, spec.securityContext.supplementalGroups[*] and spec.securityContext.fsGroup to integer greater than 0
Misconfigurations.Resolution: Set 'containers[].securityContext.runAsGroup' to a non-zero integer or leave undefined.

Misconfigurations.Title: Runs with a root primary or supplementary GID
Misconfigurations.Description: According to pod security standard 'Non-root groups', containers should be forbidden from running with a root primary or supplementary GID.
Misconfigurations.Message: service rasa-x-postgresql in null namespace should set spec.securityContext.runAsGroup, spec.securityContext.supplementalGroups[*] and spec.securityContext.fsGroup to integer greater than 0
Misconfigurations.Resolution: Set 'containers[].securityContext.runAsGroup' to a non-zero integer or leave undefined.

Misconfigurations.Title: ConfigMap with secrets
Misconfigurations.Description: Storing secrets in configMaps is unsafe
Misconfigurations.Message: ConfigMap 'rasa-x-rabbit-config' in '' namespace stores secrets in key(s) or value(s) '{"default_pass "}'
Misconfigurations.Resolution: Remove password/secret from configMap data value

Misconfigurations.Title: Default capabilities: some containers do not drop all
Misconfigurations.Description: The container should drop all default capabilities and add only those that are needed for its execution.
Misconfigurations.Message: Container 'db-migration-service' of StatefulSet 'rasa-x-db-migration-service' should add 'ALL' to 'securityContext.capabilities.drop'

Misconfigurations.Title: CPU not limited
Misconfigurations.Description: Enforcing CPU limits prevents DoS via resource exhaustion.
Misconfigurations.Message: Container 'db-migration-service' of StatefulSet 'rasa-x-db-migration-service' should set 'resources.limits.cpu'

Misconfigurations.Title: Runs as root user
Misconfigurations.Description: Force the running image to run as a non-root user to ensure least privileges.
Misconfigurations.Message: Container 'db-migration-service' of StatefulSet 'rasa-x-db-migration-service' should set 'securityContext.runAsNonRoot' to true

Misconfigurations.Title: Root file system is not read-only
Misconfigurations.Description: An immutable root file system prevents applications from writing to their local disk. This can limit intrusions, as attackers will not be able to tamper with the file system or write foreign executables to disk.
Misconfigurations.Message: Container 'db-migration-service' of StatefulSet 'rasa-x-db-migration-service' should set 'securityContext.readOnlyRootFilesystem' to true

Misconfigurations.Title: CPU requests not specified
Misconfigurations.Description: When containers have resource requests specified, the scheduler can make better decisions about which nodes to place pods on, and how to deal with resource contention.
Misconfigurations.Message: Container 'db-migration-service' of StatefulSet 'rasa-x-db-migration-service' should set 'resources.requests.cpu'

Misconfigurations.Title: Memory requests not specified
Misconfigurations.Description: When containers have memory requests specified, the scheduler can make better decisions about which nodes to place pods on, and how to deal with resource contention.
Misconfigurations.Message: Container 'db-migration-service' of StatefulSet 'rasa-x-db-migration-service' should set 'resources.requests.memory'

Misconfigurations.Title: Memory not limited
Misconfigurations.Description: Enforcing memory limits prevents DoS via resource exhaustion.
Misconfigurations.Message: Container 'db-migration-service' of StatefulSet 'rasa-x-db-migration-service' should set 'resources.limits.memory'

Misconfigurations.Title: Runs with UID <= 10000
Misconfigurations.Description: Force the container to run with user ID > 10000 to avoid conflicts with the hostâ€™s user table.
Misconfigurations.Message: Container 'db-migration-service' of StatefulSet 'rasa-x-db-migration-service' should set 'securityContext.runAsUser' > 10000

Misconfigurations.Title: Runs with GID <= 10000
Misconfigurations.Description: Force the container to run with group ID > 10000 to avoid conflicts with the hostâ€™s user table.
Misconfigurations.Message: Container 'db-migration-service' of StatefulSet 'rasa-x-db-migration-service' should set 'securityContext.runAsGroup' > 10000

Misconfigurations.Title: Runtime/Default Seccomp profile not set
Misconfigurations.Description: According to pod security standard 'Seccomp', the RuntimeDefault seccomp profile must be required, or allow specific additional profiles.
Misconfigurations.Message: Either Pod or Container should set 'securityContext.seccompProfile.type' to 'RuntimeDefault'

Misconfigurations.Title: Seccomp policies disabled
Misconfigurations.Description: A program inside the container can bypass Seccomp protection policies.
Misconfigurations.Message: container db-migration-service of statefulset rasa-x-db-migration-service in default namespace should specify a seccomp profile
Misconfigurations.Resolution: Specify seccomp either by annotation or by seccomp profile type having allowed values as per pod security standards

Misconfigurations.Title: Container capabilities must only include NET_BIND_SERVICE
Misconfigurations.Description: Containers must drop ALL capabilities, and are only permitted to add back the NET_BIND_SERVICE capability.
Misconfigurations.Message: container should drop all
Misconfigurations.Resolution: Set 'spec.containers[*].securityContext.capabilities.drop' to 'ALL' and only add 'NET_BIND_SERVICE' to 'spec.containers[*].securityContext.capabilities.add'.

Misconfigurations.Title: Runs with a root primary or supplementary GID
Misconfigurations.Description: According to pod security standard 'Non-root groups', containers should be forbidden from running with a root primary or supplementary GID.
Misconfigurations.Message: statefulset rasa-x-db-migration-service in default namespace should set spec.securityContext.runAsGroup, spec.securityContext.supplementalGroups[*] and spec.securityContext.fsGroup to integer greater than 0
Misconfigurations.Resolution: Set 'containers[].securityContext.runAsGroup' to a non-zero integer or leave undefined.

Misconfigurations.Title: Runs with a root primary or supplementary GID
Misconfigurations.Description: According to pod security standard 'Non-root groups', containers should be forbidden from running with a root primary or supplementary GID.
Misconfigurations.Message: service rasa-x-db-migration-service-headless in default namespace should set spec.securityContext.runAsGroup, spec.securityContext.supplementalGroups[*] and spec.securityContext.fsGroup to integer greater than 0
Misconfigurations.Resolution: Set 'containers[].securityContext.runAsGroup' to a non-zero integer or leave undefined.

Misconfigurations.Title: Can elevate its own privileges
Misconfigurations.Description: A program inside the container can elevate its own privileges and run as root, which might give the program control over the container and node.
Misconfigurations.Message: Container 'rasa-x' of Deployment 'rasa-x-duckling' should set 'securityContext.allowPrivilegeEscalation' to false

Misconfigurations.Message: Container 'rasa-x' of Deployment 'rasa-x-duckling' should add 'ALL' to 'securityContext.capabilities.drop'

Misconfigurations.Description: An immutable root file system prevents applications from writing to their local disk. This can limit intrusions, as attackers will not be able to tamper with the file system or write foreign executables to disk.
Misconfigurations.Message: Container 'rasa-x' of Deployment 'rasa-x-duckling' should set 'securityContext.readOnlyRootFilesystem' to true

Misconfigurations.Message: Container 'rasa-x' of Deployment 'rasa-x-duckling' should set 'securityContext.runAsUser' > 10000

Misconfigurations.Title: Runs with GID <= 10000
Misconfigurations.Description: Force the container to run with group ID > 10000 to avoid conflicts with the hostâ€™s user table.
Misconfigurations.Message: Container 'rasa-x' of Deployment 'rasa-x-duckling' should set 'securityContext.runAsGroup' > 10000

Misconfigurations.Title: Runtime/Default Seccomp profile not set
Misconfigurations.Description: According to pod security standard 'Seccomp', the RuntimeDefault seccomp profile must be required, or allow specific additional profiles.
Misconfigurations.Message: Either Pod or Container should set 'securityContext.seccompProfile.type' to 'RuntimeDefault'

Misconfigurations.Title: Seccomp policies disabled
Misconfigurations.Description: A program inside the container can bypass Seccomp protection policies.
Misconfigurations.Message: container rasa-x of deployment rasa-x-duckling in default namespace should specify a seccomp profile
Misconfigurations.Resolution: Specify seccomp either by annotation or by seccomp profile type having allowed values as per pod security standards

Misconfigurations.Title: ConfigMap with sensitive content
Misconfigurations.Description: Storing sensitive content such as usernames and email addresses in configMaps is unsafe
Misconfigurations.Message: ConfigMap 'rasa-x-rasa-configuration-files' in 'default' namespace stores sensitive contents in key(s) or value(s) '{"  username"}'
Misconfigurations.Resolution: Remove sensitive content from configMap data value

Misconfigurations.Description: According to pod security standard 'Non-root groups', containers should be forbidden from running with a root primary or supplementary GID.
Misconfigurations.Message: configmap rasa-x-rasa-x-configuration-files in default namespace should set spec.securityContext.runAsGroup, spec.securityContext.supplementalGroups[*] and spec.securityContext.fsGroup to integer greater than 0
Misconfigurations.Resolution: Set 'containers[].securityContext.runAsGroup' to a non-zero integer or leave undefined.

Misconfigurations.Title: Can elevate its own privileges
Misconfigurations.Description: A program inside the container can elevate its own privileges and run as root, which might give the program control over the container and node.
Misconfigurations.Message: Container 'rasa-x' of Deployment 'rasa-x-rasa-x' should set 'securityContext.allowPrivilegeEscalation' to false

Misconfigurations.Title: Default capabilities: some containers do not drop all
Misconfigurations.Description: The container should drop all default capabilities and add only those that are needed for its execution.
Misconfigurations.Message: Container 'rasa-x' of Deployment 'rasa-x-rasa-x' should add 'ALL' to 'securityContext.capabilities.drop'

Misconfigurations.Title: CPU not limited
Misconfigurations.Description: Enforcing CPU limits prevents DoS via resource exhaustion.
Misconfigurations.Message: Container 'rasa-x' of Deployment 'rasa-x-rasa-x' should set 'resources.limits.cpu'

Misconfigurations.Title: Runs as root user
Misconfigurations.Description: Force the running image to run as a non-root user to ensure least privileges.
Misconfigurations.Message: Container 'rasa-x' of Deployment 'rasa-x-rasa-x' should set 'securityContext.runAsNonRoot' to true

Misconfigurations.Title: Root file system is not read-only
Misconfigurations.Description: An immutable root file system prevents applications from writing to their local disk. This can limit intrusions, as attackers will not be able to tamper with the file system or write foreign executables to disk.
Misconfigurations.Message: Container 'rasa-x' of Deployment 'rasa-x-rasa-x' should set 'securityContext.readOnlyRootFilesystem' to true

Misconfigurations.Title: CPU requests not specified
Misconfigurations.Description: When containers have resource requests specified, the scheduler can make better decisions about which nodes to place pods on, and how to deal with resource contention.
Misconfigurations.Message: Container 'rasa-x' of Deployment 'rasa-x-rasa-x' should set 'resources.requests.cpu'

Misconfigurations.Title: Memory requests not specified
Misconfigurations.Description: When containers have memory requests specified, the scheduler can make better decisions about which nodes to place pods on, and how to deal with resource contention.
Misconfigurations.Message: Container 'rasa-x' of Deployment 'rasa-x-rasa-x' should set 'resources.requests.memory'

Misconfigurations.Title: Memory not limited
Misconfigurations.Description: Enforcing memory limits prevents DoS via resource exhaustion.
Misconfigurations.Message: Container 'rasa-x' of Deployment 'rasa-x-rasa-x' should set 'resources.limits.memory'

Misconfigurations.Title: Runs with UID <= 10000
Misconfigurations.Description: Force the container to run with user ID > 10000 to avoid conflicts with the hostâ€™s user table.
Misconfigurations.Message: Container 'rasa-x' of Deployment 'rasa-x-rasa-x' should set 'securityContext.runAsUser' > 10000

Misconfigurations.Title: Runs with GID <= 10000
Misconfigurations.Description: Force the container to run with group ID > 10000 to avoid conflicts with the hostâ€™s user table.
Misconfigurations.Message: Container 'rasa-x' of Deployment 'rasa-x-rasa-x' should set 'securityContext.runAsGroup' > 10000

Misconfigurations.Title: Runtime/Default Seccomp profile not set
Misconfigurations.Description: According to pod security standard 'Seccomp', the RuntimeDefault seccomp profile must be required, or allow specific additional profiles.
Misconfigurations.Message: Either Pod or Container should set 'securityContext.seccompProfile.type' to 'RuntimeDefault'

Misconfigurations.Title: Seccomp policies disabled
Misconfigurations.Description: A program inside the container can bypass Seccomp protection policies.
Misconfigurations.Message: container rasa-x of deployment rasa-x-rasa-x in default namespace should specify a seccomp profile
Misconfigurations.Resolution: Specify seccomp either by annotation or by seccomp profile type having allowed values as per pod security standards

Misconfigurations.Title: Container capabilities must only include NET_BIND_SERVICE
Misconfigurations.Description: Containers must drop ALL capabilities, and are only permitted to add back the NET_BIND_SERVICE capability.
Misconfigurations.Message: container should drop all
Misconfigurations.Resolution: Set 'spec.containers[*].securityContext.capabilities.drop' to 'ALL' and only add 'NET_BIND_SERVICE' to 'spec.containers[*].securityContext.capabilities.add'.

Misconfigurations.Title: Runs with a root primary or supplementary GID
Misconfigurations.Description: According to pod security standard 'Non-root groups', containers should be forbidden from running with a root primary or supplementary GID.
Misconfigurations.Message: deployment rasa-x-rasa-x in default namespace should set spec.securityContext.runAsGroup, spec.securityContext.supplementalGroups[*] and spec.securityContext.fsGroup to integer greater than 0
Misconfigurations.Resolution: Set 'containers[].securityContext.runAsGroup' to a non-zero integer or leave undefined.

Misconfigurations.Title: Runs with a root primary or supplementary GID
Misconfigurations.Description: According to pod security standard 'Non-root groups', containers should be forbidden from running with a root primary or supplementary GID.
Misconfigurations.Message: service rasa-x-rasa-x in default namespace should set spec.securityContext.runAsGroup, spec.securityContext.supplementalGroups[*] and spec.securityContext.fsGroup to integer greater than 0
Misconfigurations.Resolution: Set 'containers[].securityContext.runAsGroup' to a non-zero integer or leave undefined.

Misconfigurations.Title: Runs with a root primary or supplementary GID
Misconfigurations.Description: According to pod security standard 'Non-root groups', containers should be forbidden from running with a root primary or supplementary GID.
Misconfigurations.Message: persistentvolumeclaim rasa-x-rasa-x-claim in null namespace should set spec.securityContext.runAsGroup, spec.securityContext.supplementalGroups[*] and spec.securityContext.fsGroup to integer greater than 0
Misconfigurations.Resolution: Set 'containers[].securityContext.runAsGroup' to a non-zero integer or leave undefined.
